post_content:
Gentleman, I offered the Pelty card to Michael, but we didn't come to a deal. Now on eBay.

1909 T206 Tolstoi Pelty-obvious hole. Crease upper left. Corner wear-Now on eBay.

1909 T206 Camnitz (hands above head)-corner wear, lower left corner crease and crease going up diagonally from bottom border to the right through Camnitz's body. Lower right diagonal crease rising to the right. $40.00

S/h is $5.00 except in the states of California, Oregon and Washington in which cases the s/h is $5.50.  If paying by PayPal, please pay by PayPal Gift/Friends and Family to [url]wizard15243@yahoo.com[/url].
